page.title: 08Newbold College Binfield
page.content: Newbold College is run by{Seventh Day {Adventists.}The 27 full time teachers teach History,English,Music,{Theology, French,Greek and Hebrew.The 250 students can take A Levels or a degree.The BA takes 3 years of study and for a MA a student studies for another year. The Adventist had the college purpose built in 1945.Students come from all round the world.The Salisbury Hall is used as a church as well as for general purposes.The buildings include lecture rooms,a library,a gymnasium, the{E.G.White Centre,}domitories and other student accommodation. The Adventists believe they must work with their hands as well as their minds so most students have to work either cleaning,maintaining the college,gardening or working in the greenhouse.
